reviews.review:
Infinity War is easily the darkest entry in the MCU to date. Like the others, there is plenty of laughs to be had, but over the course of the run time, the laughing turns to panic as the drama has never been more real. Thanos is a fantastic villain, pulled off by very well done motion capture and a subtle performance by Josh Brolin. He carries the film, having more time on screen than any of the heroes, and that is a good thing. We have come to known these characters so well that we don't really need to know that much more about them, just that they are put to the biggest test they've ever known. Finally, Marvel solved their mediocre villain problem, with Black Panther and also in this. 
The story does feel a tad messy at times and it feels as though many of the characters had very little to do at all. But those problems are forgivable because of how huge the film is overall. The fact that this was done well at all, with this many characters, films, and subplots all converging over 10 years, it's very impressive, and only the smart folks at Marvel could've done it this way.
A kaleidoscopic journey through the Marvel Universe and back, Infinity War is more than just the icing on the cake.
The best mcu film by now
I want some evil super villain to wipe out all other super hero's so Hollywood does not feel compelled to release a super hero movie every other day.
i love this installment in the Marvel franchise. wow.

The first part of the culmination so many have been waiting for keeps you glued to your seat until the end where you are left wondering where to go from here then boom post credit scene and some hope is regained.
At it's best when it is comedic. Mostly fails when it tries to have emotional gravitas.
Horrible movie - should be named  mr potato head goes crazy

The movie was great and I had a really good time, but it felt a bit rushed. I think there should have been more content for characters and not to forget they brushed over some important details. I think Age of Altron was better.
One last thing: You should have done better Russo bros.
Best Movie yet. I understand why some may not like the movie, but the overall movie is great and really integrate all the characters well. A+
